title: Bedcover, 18th century
medium:
Medium: silk, wool wadding
Technique: trapunto
description: Bedcover with a green side and a red side held together by quilting in yellow silk. Field is made up of ten arches with human figures within a border showing human figures and plant forms.

tombstone.epitaph:
Bedcover, 18th century. Medium: silk, wool wadding
Technique: trapunto. 1932-9-3.
